text: Mu sa cong ta de zongzu zhong jianxuanle 7 shi geren lai fu wo de yuehui; dang tamen wei dizhen suo xiji de shihou, ta shuo: Wo de zhu a! Jiaruo ni yiyu, namo, yiqian ni zaoyi huimie tamen he wo. Nandao ni yao wei women zhong de yuren de xingwei er huimie women ma? Zhe zhishi ni de kaoyan, ni jie ci shi ni yiyu zhe wu ru qitu, shi ni yiyu zhe zou shang zhengdao. Ni shi women de baohu zhe, gu qiu ni raoshu women, ci min women. Ni shi zuishan de raoshu zhe.
